WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
I have downloaded the source code but the HAPPhone.7.1 doesn't compile due to XPath. The project has a reference to System.Xml.XPath that doesn't exist in WP7.1.
Â 
Paolo.
WorkItem.Summary: HAPPhone.7.1 solution doesn't compile due to XPath

Comments.Message: The System.Xml.Xpath.dll file from the Silverlight 4 SDK needs to be referenced. Otherwise remove the *.Xpath.cs files from the solution
this will be updated in the next nuget release
